lines.text: How come you can speak Indian?
Well, my mother was the daughter of a Cherokee chief.
I don't really remember because she died two years before I was born.
A good Christian does not flinch with difficulty.
He doesn't court them by drinking either.
you can't trick a man unless he's aiming to trick you.
Well, because people in general like the idea of getting something for nothing. And the trickster affords him that opportunity.
I'm going to give up gambling until I get you there.
Well, I'd be willing to bet ya.
[to a deer with a large rack of antlers]
The top of the morning to you! Eh? Well, thank you. That's a fine hat you're wearin' yourself.
